description.value:
Race: Oread 
Replaced Trait(s): Base Statistics 

Stolid and indomitable, ironsoul oreads undertake great works, both physical and conceptual, with unwavering determination.

Typical Alignment LN
Ability Modifiers +2 Con, +2 Wis, ï¿½2 Dex
Alternate Spell-Like Ability Ironsouls gain <%SPELLS%unerring weapon%%>unerring weapon<%END> as a spell-like ability.
Metal Affinity This racial trait functions as and can be replaced as the base oread's earth affinity, except it benefits sorcerers with the shaitan bloodline and spellcasters with the Metal subdomain.

Possessed of patience and a sense of self-refinement through struggle, ironsouls reflect their ancestry in their continuous and determined efforts towards self-improvement. Ironsouls are most at home in areas that reflect that same sense of directed and intentional growth, and they operate best within existing formal structures.

Ironsouls wear their elemental heritage on their skin, with most having some amount of metallic sheen. Their skin tone varies, with colors ranging from gold and silver to copper-green and dull, oxide gray.
